summary: This document is a certificate of existence for Zorro Management, LLC, issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the company was duly organized on December 14, 2016, and has met all necessary legal requirements to operate in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter certifies the existence of Zorro Management, LLC, confirming its legal status and compliance with local laws.

events.title: Formation of Zorro Management, LLC
events.description: Zorro Management, LLC filed Articles of Organization with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

keyFacts: Zorro Management, LLC was organized on December 14, 2016.
The company is registered in the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of the company is perpetual.
All applicable fees have been paid by the company.
No Articles of Termination have been filed for the company.
